message: EA unique identifier (EA_ID) is a required field.
EA unique identifier (EA_ID) is not recognised. Check that the reference you've given is either 2 letters and 4 numbers (EPR permits) or a 5- or 6-figure number (older waste management licences)
The Site_Name you gave does not match the one we have in our recordEntities for the EA_ID.
Return type (Rtn_Type) value is missing.  You must supply a return type exactly as it's given in the EA controlled list.
Return type (Rtn_Type) value is incorrect.  You must supply a return type exactly as it's given in the EA controlled list.

Monitoring Date (Mon_Date) value is missing. You need to format the date using the format yyyy-mm-dd.  If also specifying time, use the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss (eg 2015-10-31 or 2015-10-31T06:00:00)

Monitoring Date (Mon_Date) value is incorrect. You need to format the date using the format yyyy-mm-dd.  If also specifying time, use the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss (eg 2015-10-31 or 2015-10-31T06:00:00)
Parameter value is missing.  Parameter values must be supplied.
Parameter value is incorrect.  You must supply a parameter exactly as it's given in the EA controlled list.
Value field is missing.  Please refer to the DEP for further information with regard to supplying values.
Value field is incorrect.  Please refer to the DEP for further information with regard to supplying values.
Unit values must be supplied when the Value field is used
Unit value is incorrect.  You must supply units exactly as it\u2019s given in the EA controlled list.
Units must not be used when the Txt_Value field is used
Monitoring Point (Mon_Point) values must be supplied
Monitoring Point (Mon_Point) values must be no more than 30 characters.
Return period (Rtn_Period) must be supplied exactly as it's given in the EA controlled list.
Text value (Txt_Value) must be supplied exactly as it's given in the EA controlled list.
Reference Period (Ref_Period) must be supplied exactly as it\u2019s given in the EA controlled list.
Method or Standard (Meth_Stand) must be supplied exactly as it\u2019s given in the EA controlled list.
Site name may only contain alphanumeric characters and spaces.
Site name may only be 255 characters long
Site name must be given.
Sample Reference (Smpl_Ref) values must be no more than 255 characters.
Sample Reference (Smpl_Ref) values should only contain letters and numbers. Remove any symbols.
Sample By (Smpl_By) values must be no more than 255 characters.
Comments must not be more than 255 characters.
Comments must be given if the Txt_Value field is given as "See comment"
Commercial In Confidence (CiC) values must not be more than 255 characters.
Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS) values must not be more than 255 characters.
Recovery and Disposal Code (RD_Code) values must not be more than 255 characters.
Qualifiers (Qualifier) must be supplied exactly as given in the EA controlled list.
One of Value or Txt_Value must be specified
Only one of Value and Txt_Value can be specified
